attributes.action: take heed of the points being made on this, his website, and take appropriate action.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of creating a petition option and giving people the ILLUSION of having a say, why not implement the requirements of the people and have a successful, happy Britain.  
Let us know that we are being heard.  
Responses from a computer are NOT good enough.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
